levels.description: Demanding $10 million in cash delivered by helicopter within the hour.
Demanding $5 million in cash, delivered to the front entrance by law enforcement.
Demanding $1 million in cash transferred electronically to a specific account.
Demanding a helicopter with no police escort and free passage to an undisclosed location.
Demanding a car with tinted windows and a police-free route out of the city, monitored via radio.
Demanding a regular vehicle and assurance of no immediate police pursuit for at least 15 minutes.
Demanding the immediate release of three detained family members, with full immunity.
Demanding the release of two detained family members, with assurance of minimal charges.
Demanding the release of one detained family member, pending negotiation on charges.
Demanding full legal immunity and no prosecution for all actions taken during the hostage situation.
Demanding a reduced set of charges and assurance of minimum sentencing for actions taken.
Demanding a negotiated sentence with reduced penalties in exchange for peaceful surrender.
